participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, often uses artistic outlets to express emotions.
participant_1.background: I write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions. I like to do my laundry on the weekends when I have more time. I'm my own boss. I need to keep my stock market reports organized. I watch funny movies to cheer myself up.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Optimistic and nurturing, always tries to find the silver lining in difficult situations.
participant_2.background: I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances. I love to grow sunflowers. I wear my boots as little as possible. My favorite fiction genres are sci fi and horror. I can stay up late to watch my favorite TV shows.

content.text: Hello, what is your name?
My name is Sarah, what is yours?
My name is Michael, it is nice to meet you Sarah.
It is nice to meet you too Michael.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to grow sunflowers, watch my favorite TV shows, and stay up late.
I like to grow sunflowers too! They are beautiful flowers.
I know right, they are so pretty.
What are some of your favorite TV shows?
I like to watch sci fi and horror shows.
Me too! I love a good scary movie.
What are some of your favorite scary movies?
I like the Conjuring movies, the Conjuring 2 is my favorite.
I have not seen that one, but I have seen the first one.
It is really good, you should check it out.
I will, thanks for the recommendation.
You are welcome. I am glad we have something in common.
Me too, it is nice to meet someone who is into the same things I am.
Yes it is, I hope we can talk more in the future.
Me too, I enjoyed talking to you.
